attr.attrdef: A character string provided by the aerial photography vendor that corresponds to the file name for each individual photo
The X coordinate of the photo centerpoint in UTM meters
The Y coordinate of the photo centerpoint in UTM meters
The altitude of the photo acquisition in feet
The nominal ground sampling distance of the imagery in centimeters
The name/description of the project region
The name of the aerial photography vendor
Time of acquisition as a text field

citeinfo.origin: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources and Minnesota Geospatial Information Office
citeinfo.title: Spring Aerial Imagery Photo Center Points and Acquisition Dates, Minnesota, 2009-2014

descript.abstract: This dataset contains the center point locations for all images acquired under the Minnesota Spring Aerial Imagery Program from 2009 through 2014. Attributes for each center point include the photo file ID, the center point location, the date of acquisition, and the vendor. Additional attributes for acquisition altitude and camera system are also provided where available.
descript.purpose:
This dataset provides photo level metadata for all imagery acquired for the Spring Aerial Imagery Program. The goal of the program was to acquire 4-band leaf-off imagery statewide at 0.5-meter resolution. The State collaborated with partners in order to acquire higher-resolution imagery (1-foot) in many areas.
For more information on the program, see: http://www.mngeo.state.mn.us/chouse/airphoto/spring2009-2015.html

citeinfo.title:
Digital orthophoto quarter-quadrangles (DOQQs) from the Spring Aerial Imagery Program:
1. Northeast: a. Half-meter resolution: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-ne2009-50cm-airphotos b. One-foot resolution: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-nc2009-30cm-airphotos
2. East-Central: a. Half-meter resolution: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-ec2010-50cm-airphotos b. One-foot resolution: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-ec2010tc-1ft-airphotos
3. Southern: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-so2011-50cm-airphotos
4. Central & Northwest: a. Half-meter resolution: http://www.mngeo.state.mn.us/chouse/airphoto/centralmn13.html (metadata forthcoming) b. Polk and Beltrami Counties: https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/base-saip-polkbelt2014-airphotos

timeperd.current: Acquisition dates range from April 2009 through May 2014.

theme.themekey: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover, aerial photography, air photos, imagery

browse.browsed: Data symbolized by acquisition date for each photo.

dataqual.complete: All spring imagery from the statewide program are represented by a center point. All attributes are provided for each center point, except that acquisition altitude and camera system are not available for the Central & Northwest region.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy of these center points has not been tested. The positional accuracy of the resulting DOQQs has been tested and the user should refer to the metadata for the DOQQs for the results of this testing (see Associated Datasets).

procstep.procdesc:
Photo center points were delivered to the State of Minnesota by each vendor participating in the Spring Aerial Imagery Program:
Keystone: Northeast region (2009) Surdex: East-Central (2010) and South (2011) Quantum: Central & Northwest region (2013 and 2014)
Minnesota Department of Natural Resources staff standardized the fields from each of these individual acquisition areas and merged them into a single geodatabase at the conclusion of the statewide acquisition.
